Document:
# Felinids
Small and mischievous cat-eared people. Being small in itself has lots of upsides and downsides.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Their claws do Slash and Piercing damage. - Can walk completely silently, but only while barefoot. - They're slowed down less when hurt.
## Drawbacks
- They take [color=#ffa500]15% more Blunt, Slash and Piercing damage[/color]. - They have slightly less stamina than Humans.
